title: x4 (Anna Lawson, Judy Bushman, Linda & Cynthia Herrera)
description:
Two women murdered hours apart, and a community on high alert. How an unsolved double homicide from years before gives the clue needed to solve them all.

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
